title: Simply Christian
description: “Wright offers us a genial, intelligent view of Christianity, and [ Simply Christian ] invites us to compare his work with C.S. Lewis’s classic in the same vein, Mere Christianity .” — Washington Post Though originally published in 2006, N.T. Wright’s Simply Christian has already reached the status of a classic of biblical scholarship. Wright, Bishop of Durham for the Church of England, has been called “the world’s leading New Testament scholar” by Newsweek , and Simply Christian an “outstanding” treatise on Christianity that “will confirm, challenge, and deepen your grasp of Christian faith and practice” by Christianity Today .
author: N.T. Wright
